means: 使熟悉( acquaint的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I'll console Mr. Edgar by acquainting him with the turn Heathcliff's humour has taken.
sentence.Network_cn: 我要报告埃德加先生,说希刺克厉夫的脾气有什么样的转变,借以安慰他.

sentence.Network_en: He was in Italy at that time, acquainting himself with Italian styles.
sentence.Network_cn: 当时他在意大利, 正在努力熟悉意大利的风格.

sentence.Network_en: One can know the thing through the human. Acquainting human should be ahead of planning matters.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的管理人员都很明白,管理对象是事,不是人,通过人而知事, 谋事先认知人.

list.abs: 不过这种点头之交（nodding acquaintance）十分重要，因为一旦需要深交，你知道该去哪里找它。很多深交都是这么从初交变成的。
九十 in English, translation,... ... 旧事 former matter;old affair 旧识 former acquaintance;old friend 救世 salvation.
华纳兄弟影片公司电影列表 - 豆丁网 ... 空军 Air Force 老相识 Old Acquaintance 永恒的少女 The Constant Nymph.
英语短语搭配 - 豆丁网 ... worried about （担心） 4 后接介词 acquainted with （对……熟悉） angrywith sb. （对某人生气）.

entry.def: If you acquaint someone with something, you tell them about it so that they know it. If you acquaint yourself with something, you learn about it.

example.ex: ...efforts to acquaint the public with their rights under the new law...
example.tran: 为使公众熟悉新法律所赋予的权利而作出的努力

example.ex: I want to acquaint myself with your strengths and weaknesses.
example.tran: 我想知道你有哪些长处以及不足。

auth_sentence.content: It is worth acquainting yourself with books on 'how to structure a screenplay'.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is worth acquainting yourself with books on 'how to structure a screenplay'.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is worth acquainting yourself with books on 'how to structure a screenplay'.

auth_sentence.content: What possible good would come of acquainting new mates with any vision of decades-old chemistry?
auth_sentence.res_content: What possible good would come of acquainting new mates with any vision of decades-old chemistry?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What possible good would come of acquainting new mates with any vision of decades-old chemistry?
